snippet: Priorities USA Action, a “super PAC” supporting President Obama, released an advertisement on Tuesday suggesting that Mitt Romney’s actions at Bain Capital indirectly contributed to a woman’s death.
abstract: Text and assessment of advertisement by Priorities USA Action, super PAC supporting Pres Obama, that suggests Mitt Romney’s actions at Bain Capital indirectly contributed to death of the wife of former factory worker Joe Soptic.
lead_paragraph: Priorities USA Action, a “super PAC” supporting President Obama, released an advertisement on Tuesday suggesting that Mitt Romney’s actions at Bain Capital indirectly contributed to a woman’s death.

headline.main: Ex-Factory Worker Links Losses to Bain
headline.print_headline: Ex-Factory Worker Links Losses to Bain
